title: Skywatcher
description: Armies gather on the horizon. A world on the edge of destruction A hero faces the ultimate choice.Driven onward by his quest for revenge, Macsen has come the Kingdom of Audran, There he joins with the Order of the Skywatchers to bring down Goren, the mage responsible for the destruction of his village. Armies gather in the wilds of the Upper Airs, as Goren readies the final step of his plan to destroy the world and then remake it in his image.Battle rages in the killing skies, swords and magic clash. And the fate of the world lies in the hands of one the thrilling conclusion of The Storm at the Center of the World!
author: Jon Connington
